title: What was the event or events that led up to PlameGate? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to testimony given in the CIA leak grand jury investigation the United States v. Libby, Bush administration officials Richard Armitage, Karl Rove, and Lewis Libby discussed the employment of then-classified, covert CIA officer, Valerie E. Wilson (also known as Valerie Plame) who is a an American writer (spy novelist), with members of the press. That information was published by Robert Novak of the Washington Post. There is no indication that Valerie E. Wilson was a CIA Case Officer (someone who covertly “handles” foreign agents in a foreign country).
